summaryOfNewsArticle: On April 4, 2023, the City Council announced a new public transportation policy aimed at enhancing accessibility and sustainability in urban areas. The policy, titled the Green Transit Initiative, will be implemented in phases, with the first phase set to begin in June 2023. A public consultation period was launched on April 3, 2023, to gather input from citizens. Key components of the policy include expanded bus routes, improved accessibility for people with disabilities, and increased investment in electric and low-emission vehicles. The City Council and the Public Transport Authority are leading the initiative, with a focus on reducing carbon emissions and improving service quality.
title: City Announces Green Transit Initiative to Improve Urban Transportation Access
